suppress.notes: file name: AppleJavaExtensions-1.4.jar we are onl latest version. fixes not available yet.
file name: dom4j-1.6.1.jar we are on latest version. fixes not available yet.

Shadowed dependency from AppInsights-Core. Unfortunately, not propagating and applying an override for transitive dependencies. Anyway, this is specific to deserialisation of AtomicDoubleArray and CompoundOrdering classes: https://github.com/google/guava/wiki/CVE-2018-10237
org.slf4j:slf4j-api:1.7.25 -> inherited from org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-web. No fix available yet.
CVE-2018-1258: we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258
Suppressing as it seems a false positive as per https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/1573
Not applicable - Randomness vulnerability when using SecureRandomFactoryBean
